item.title: Video Editing and Captioning - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor who can edit and finesse short recorded videos. The task involves adding an engaging intro, enhancing the video quality, and adding closed captions where necessary. The ideal candidate should have experience in video editing software and possess a creative eye for visual storytelling. Attention to detail and the ability to work efficiently under tight deadlines are essential.
   
  Skills required:
  - Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
  - Strong understanding of video composition and storytelling
  - Ability to add closed captions accurately and creatively
  
  This is a small-sized project with a duration of under 1 month. We are seeking an intermediate video editor who can bring our videos to life with captivating intros and engaging captions.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$13.00
Posted On: June 20, 2024 05:53 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Education, Video Post-Editing, Subtitles
Skills: Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Education, Video Post-Editing, Subtitles
Country: United States
click to apply

so, I need to get those done those similar to Iman Gadzi and Alex Hormozi styles.

urgent hiring.

item.title: Video Production Manager - Upwork
item.description:
Producing a 2-3 minute long "about us" video for a newly established recruitment company - using different angles and shots to create a luxury-style video.

1. Pre-Production:
   - Understand the agency's brand, vision, and key messaging
   - Develop a concept and storyboard for the video
   - Plan the shoot locations, equipment, and crew requirements

2. Production:
   - Set up and operate professional video equipment (camera, lighting, audio)
   - Capture high-quality footage, including B-roll and establishing shots

3. Post-Production:
   - Edit the raw footage into a cohesive and engaging 2-3 minute video
   - Incorporate the agency's branding elements (logo, colors, fonts)
   - Add motion graphics, titles, and visual effects as needed
   - Color grade and enhance the video for a polished look
   - Export the final video in the required format and resolution

4. Delivery:
   - Provide the final video file(s)
   - Ensure the video meets their specifications and requirements
   - Collaborate for any necessary revisions or feedback

5. Additional Considerations:
   - Maintain clear communication throughout the process
   - Adhere to the agreed-upon timeline and deadlines


Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 20, 2024 05:38 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Video Commercial, Videography, Explainer Video
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Video Commercial, Videography, Explainer Video
Country: ARE
click to apply

item.title: Script Writer for YouTube channel. Football/Soccer niche - Upwork
item.description:
Experienced Script Writer needed for a YouTube channel about Football/Soccer.  

We want to create mini documentary videos similar to:
https://www.youtube.com/@TheFootball-Library/videos
https://www.youtube.com/@KickKorner/videos

- There will mostly be videos around 12-15 minutes long 1800 to 2600 words, eventually longer format 22-25+ mins
- Looking to do 2-3 per week to begin with
- We require as deliverable an original script with no usage of AI
- You will be required to sign an NDA


Skill Requirements:
- Great communication skills
- Fast response & turnaround time. We work with 12 and 24 hours turnarounds.
- We require an engaging writing style with the visual factor being considered.
- We require links and support resources for the video editor after your research and composition.
- Experienced with Copyright
- Be passionate about Football/Soccer

Please DO NOT apply if you don't have experience writting for youtube channels.

Looking forward to working with you!

Andrés


Hourly Range: $15.00-$50.00
Posted On: June 20, 2024 05:32 UTC
Category: Scriptwriting
Skills:Content Writing, Creative Writing, Writing, Copywriting, Article Writing, Blog Writing, Search Engine Optimization, English, Explainer Video
Skills: Content Writing, Creative Writing, Writing, Copywriting, Article Writing, Blog Writing, Search Engine Optimization, English, Explainer Video
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video content Creator - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for someone to create a few promotional videos for my social media. I have video and photo content that I can provide and I need someone to edit the content to highlight our services.

I want the videos to be used for a variety of social media platforms but the main one is for Instagram Reels.

The candidate will have exceptional video editing skills, an understanding of how to create engaging short-form content and is able to delivery according to timelines.

item.title: Looking for Experienced Video Editor for New Youtube channel - Upwork
item.description:
We're looking for a long term collaborator so Pay Attention!
We are seeking a video editor with great ability to FIND and EDIT video materials in an attention-grabbing way.
You'll be in charge of creating interesting and captivating video of about 1 to 3 minutes mainly for YouTube.
The ideal candidate should be able to:
!!! Edit a cool video with a BRISK PACE mainly with anime footage (One piece)
!! Create your video starting with the script and a voice over track, without violating copywright laws.
! Have Strong ability to grab the attention of the viewer with a eye catching editing;
! Think creatively !

If You're moved by passion, and want to test yourself and your creativity skills then reply and tell me something about you!

Thanks

Budget: $20
Posted On: June 20, 2024 05:26 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Anime, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing & Production
Skills: Video Editing, Anime, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing & Production

item.title: Audio Editing - Remove Laptop Fan Noise from Loop Video - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for an experienced audio editor to remove the audible white noise (the whirring of a laptop fan) from the background of a loop video. The video is approximately 39 minutes long. The final edited video should have clear and crisp audio without any distracting noise. Also, my dog runs in and makes a noise at 17:45 and again at 17:53, if you can remove that noise as well then even better!

I need this done today so anyone who has capacity to do it immediately will most likely get the job.

Here is the loom video:
https://www.loom.com/share/70b2912fbea34adcb79cc632920eb388

    Your responsibilities will include:
    - Carefully listening to the audio and identifying the sections with the laptop fan noise
    - Using advanced audio editing techniques to remove or minimize the noise while preserving the overall quality of the audio
    - Ensuring that the edited audio seamlessly matches the video

    Skills required:
    - Proficiency in audio editing software such as Adobe Audition or Audacity
    - Strong understanding of audio frequencies and noise reduction techniques
    - Attention to detail and ability to work accurately with audio files

    This is a small project with a duration of under 1 month. The ideal candidate should have intermediate expertise in audio editing and a portfolio showcasing similar work.

    If you are confident in your ability to deliver a high-quality edited video with clean audio, we would love to hear from you.

Budget: $10
Posted On: June 20, 2024 05:25 UTC
Category: Audio Editing
Skills:Audio Editing, Audio Post Production, Sound Mixing, Audio Production, Video Editing
Skills: Audio Editing, Audio Post Production, Sound Mixing, Audio Production, Video Editing
Country: GBR
click to apply
